column4: Does any one use wireless mouse on Ubuntu 9.04? When you right click on desktop sometimes it creates a new folder instead of show properties menu. Does anyone experience that?
it is probably sending a double click on the right button. i had a mouse start doing this. it was just old though.
is there any chance to fix it?
my mouse was old. required the purchase of another. not saying that is your problem but it has similiar symptoms
